item.title: PMM Client on Raspberry Pi 4
item.description: This will be the third in my series of Percona Products on a Raspberry Pi. My previous posts: How to Build a Percona Server “Stack” on a Raspberry Pi 3+ Raspberry Pi Bullseye Percona Server 64bit Before I get started I would like to thank guriandoro, for the work he did in compiling the PMM Client tools in his 2021 blog. My regular readers know how much I love the Raspberry Pi and MySQL.
